com.batesmaster
Class batesStamper

java.lang.Object
  com.batesmaster.batesStamper

public class batesStamper
extends java.lang.Object

batesStamper class this class is responsible for doing all the stamping.

Author:
gregory pruden, mark manoukian copyright 2009 Mark Manoukian and Gregory Pruden

setFormat

public void setFormat(java.lang.String newValue)
Modifies the numbering format

Parameters:
newValue - the string java format to use instead of the default of %05d

setOffsetx

public void setOffsetx(int newValue)
Sets the offset from the left of the page

Parameters:
newValue - the number of pixels from the left edge of the page

setOffsety

public void setOffsety(int newValue)
Sets the offset from the bottom of the page

Parameters:
newValue - the number of pixels up from the bottom edge of the page

setRotation

public void setRotation(int newValue)
Sets the rotation on the page

Parameters:
newValue - the number of degrees of rotation the page, where 0 is normal.

Parameters:
newValue - the origin to set

setSeed

public void setSeed(int newValue)
Sets a new seed value for the bates number which defaults to 1

Parameters:
newValue - the new seed value which will begin the numbering on page 1

ProcessDoc opens the document and moves thru the pages stamping.

Returns:

writebates

public boolean writebates(com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfReader currentReader,
                          com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfStamper stamper,
                          java.lang.String bates,
                          int page)
writebates computes the location and adds the bates text to the page

Parameters:
currentReader - the open reader object
stamper - the open stamper object
bates - the bates number to use
page - the page number to stamp
Returns:
return true on success false otherwise overloaded for backwards compatibility.

writebates

public boolean writebates(com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfReader currentReader,
                          com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfStamper stamper,
                          java.lang.String bates,
                          int page,
                          int rotate)
writebates computes the location and adds the bates text to the page

Parameters:
currentReader - the open reader object
stamper - the open stamper object
bates - the bates number to use
page - the page number to stamp
rotation - the rotation of the number on the page
Returns:
return true on success false otherwise
